result.title: A feature that I discovered on Codeforces
result.content:
If you want to see the problems under the tag dp you usually type: http://codeforces.com/problemset/tags/dp

I found out just now that to see the problems under the tag (dp + trees) or (dp + games) you should type:

http://codeforces.com/problemset/tags/dp,trees or http://codeforces.com/problemset/tags/dp,games
